name: UpdateSyncMapPermission
description: Update an identity's access to a specific Sync Map.

ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync Map Permission resource to update. Can be the Service's `sid` value or `default`.

MapSid.description: The SID of the Sync Map with the Sync Map Permission resource to update. Can be the Sync Map resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.

Identity.description: The application-defined string that uniquely identifies the User's Sync Map Permission resource to update.

Manage.description: Whether the identity can delete the Sync Map. Default value is `false`.

Read.description: Whether the identity can read the Sync Map and its Items. Default value is `false`.

Write.description: Whether the identity can create, update, and delete Items in the Sync Map. Default value is `false`.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Sync Map Permission resource.
**identity**: The application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource's User within the Service to an FPA token.
**manage**: Whether the identity can delete the Sync Map.
**map_sid**: The SID of the Sync Map to which the Permission applies.
**read**: Whether the identity can read the Sync Map and its Items.
**service_sid**: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) the resource is associated with.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Sync Map Permission resource.
**write**: Whether the identity can create, update, and delete Items in the Sync Map.
